Class PlayerFire

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
com.mygdx.pirategame.sprites.Entity
com.mygdx.pirategame.sprites.Projectile
com.mygdx.pirategame.sprites.PlayerFire
public class PlayerFire extends Projectile
Cannon Fire Combat related cannon fire Used by player and colleges, Use should extend to enemy ships when implementing ship combat
